name: The Far Frontier
description: The Far Frontier is a combination of two popular game genres: match 3 and strategy. While playing, two players fight using a shared match 3 area. They must use tactics and strategy to win.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64bit) Processor: i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
